body: Don't really no how to express it, but I want to say a sincere thanks to everyone who I've met on avicus and even more so to those friendly and enthusiastic people. Avicus was, a bit unfortunately in many ways, a massive part of my life a couple years ago and it's defo made me a ton of amazing memories and mates. So yes, thanks again everyone and have a good one. (:

title: Thanks
